scripts.predev: powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "\$wsl_ip = (wsl -e hostname -I).Trim(); netsh interface portproxy delete v4tov4 listenport=5000; netsh interface portproxy add v4tov4 listenport=5000 connectport=5000 connectaddress=\$wsl_ip; netsh interface portproxy delete v4tov4 listenport=5173; netsh interface portproxy add v4tov4 listenport=5173 connectport=5173 connectaddress=\$wsl_ip; echo ('WSL Port Forwarding Rules Updated for IP: ' + \$wsl_ip)"
